name: Voxeet, Inc.
description: Developer of real-time collaboration platform (cPaaS) designed to help businesses build better voice communication applications. The company's proprietary platform offers highly secure, crystal clear 3D surround-sound, audio, video experience, screen sharing, presentation mode, broadcasting, call recording, translation, messaging, scheduling and more, providing businesses with the building blocks to build great user experiences with clear audio.
one_liner: Developer of real-time collaboration platform (cPaaS) designed to help businesses build better voice communication applications. The company's proprietary platform offers highly secure, crystal clear 3D surround-sound, audio, video experience, screen sharing, presentation mode, broadcasting, call recording, translation, messaging, scheduling and more, providing businesses with the building blocks to build great user experiences with clear audio.
